item.title: LeetCode
item.description: LeetCode 基础数据结构 二分搜索速记卡 704.二分查找 public int search(int[] nums, int target) { int left=0,right=nums.length-1; while(left<=right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; if(nums[mid]>target) right=mid-1; else if(nums[mid]<target) left=mid+1; else { return mid; } } return -1; } 34.在排序数组中查找元素的第一个和最后一个位置 public int leftfun(int[] nums, int target){ int left=0,right=nums.length-1; while (left<=right){ int mid=left+(right-left)/2; if(nums[mid]>=target) right=mid-1; else if(nums[mid]<target) left=mid+1; } if(left>=nums.length||nums[left]!=target) return -1; return left; } public int rightfun(int[] nums,
